verses.roman:
purī kahe,--ke tumi, kāhāṅ tomāra vāsa
ke-mate jānile, āmi kari upavāsa

synonyms: purī kahe—Mādhavendra Purī inquired from the boy; ke tumi—who are You; kāhāṅ tomāra vāsa—where do You reside; ke-mate—how; jānile—You know; āmi kari upavāsa—I am fasting.
translation: Mādhavendra Purī said, "Who are You ? Where do You reside? And how did You know that I was fasting?"
